title: Take Block
description: Allows an entity to take blocks from the world.

affected_by_griefing_rule.title: Affected By Griefing Rule
affected_by_griefing_rule.description: If true, whether the goal is affected by the mob griefing game rule.

blocks.title: Blocks
blocks.description: Block descriptors for which blocks are valid to be taken by the entity, if empty all blocks are valid.

can_take.title: Can Take
can_take.description: Filters for if the entity should try to take a block. Self and Target are set.

chance.title: Chance
chance.description: Chance each tick for the entity to try and take a block.

on_take.title: On Take
on_take.description: Trigger ran if the entity does take a block. Self, Target, and Block are set.

requires_line_of_sight.title: Requires Line Of Sight
requires_line_of_sight.description: If true, whether the entity needs line of sight to the block they are trying to take.

xz_range.title: XZ Range
xz_range.description: XZ range from which the entity will try and take blocks from.

y_range.title: Y Range
y_range.description: Y range from which the entity will try and take blocks from.
